dataAccessDetails: Users must complete Captcha puzzle in order to search
guidanceOnLocatingIds:
Users can find identifiers by using the database on the bureau website. Users must complete a Captcha puzzle in order to search. The identifiers will be under the column header 'Nr'.

Users should be aware that identifiers are not formed in a uniform manner, and use slashes and hyphens.
description: Businesses and NGOs register with the Registration Services Bureau and receive an identification number. This number can be used as an identifier. A publicly available database can be search on the Bureau website.
name: Registration Services Bureau
